name: Deja Brew
description:
Deja Brew is a 2.5D platformer featuring physics based air propulsion. Use a compressed air gun to propel yourself through the air, or to blow hazardous objects away!

This project was developed by six students for an assessment which was dedicated 23 days of production, 5 of which were used for planning only. The project was complete as of 25th November 2019.

Development team:

Rick Ko - Mechanics, Systems and Level Designer

Sean Davidson - Sound Designer

GT Beazley - Programmer

Joanna Chen - Character and Concept Artist, Animations, Generalist

Lily Palmer - Prop Artist and Rigger

Ethan Chen - Environment Artist
